::Dark Lavacons::

        The Dark Lavacons grinned as they were finally given something fun
to do.  They let out their evil laughter, out loud, and in the blink of an
eye, engaged in battle, ready to kill.

          "HHHAAAA!!!!!  Let's rumble baby!!!!!!" Recklessa shouted, and
started firing her gatling guns like mad at one of the Inferno clones.

          Fenox blew dark fire out of his mouth at the ground, gave out a
battlecry, and then fired his dark heat optic lazers at one of the clones.

          Griplash drew his dark flame sword.  He slashed at the air a
couple times, and then went charging for one of the clone's stomach.

            Starlight instantly pulled out her dark flame crossbow, and
fired once at distant ground, dark flames spreading.  Then, she started
firing repeatedly at another clone of Inferno.

            Astral laughed at the Inferno clones, and started shooting dark
flame everywhere from his machine gun.  He went behind one of the clones,
and fired his machine gun.

            "The original's all yours!!!!!" Astral said to Starscream while
firing his machine gun at the clone.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
::Wheeljack::

        Wheeljack grinned as they got the probe on the large board.

        "Good work, now, let's get this back to Zardus!" He said.

       Wheeljack walked up to a part of the board and pressed a few buttons.
A shield went around the board and the probe, and then, flew off towards the
Alliance base.

           "Does the job automatically.  Now, we better head back as well,"
He said, stomping off in T-Rex mode.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
::Dollen::

        Dollen grinned.  This was REALLY getting fun and intense at the same
time.

        "Yes, commander!!" He said, running even faster.
